means: 破坏，毁灭，消灭，灭亡，扑灭，驱除

sentence.Network_en: There is worldwide concern about the destruction of the rainforests.
sentence.Network_cn: 全世界都在关注热带雨林遭到破坏的问题。

sentence.Network_en: To that extent they helped bring about their own destruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正是如此推波助澜，导致了自己的毁灭。

sentence.Network_en: One eye-witness said the rioters were engaged in an orgy of destruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位目击者称暴徒肆无忌惮地到处进行破坏。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... argument n 争论；辩论 △ destruction n 破坏；毁灭 opinion n 意见；看法.

高中英语必修4单词表_百度知道 ... Fierce 凶猛的；残暴的 Destruction 毁坏 Unpredictable 变化莫测的.

list.abs: destruction 破坏destructive distillation 分解蒸馏destructive distillation of wood 木材干馏
destruction 破坏destruction test 破坏试验detachment 脱离
destructive test 破坏试验destructive test 破坏性试验destructive topographic form 侵蚀地形
创新是企业家精神的灵魂。熊彼特关于企业家是从事“创造性破坏（creative destruction）”的创新者观点，凸显了企业家精神的实质和特征。一个企业最大的隐患，就是创新精神的消亡。一个企业，要么.
《创造性毁灭》(Creative Destruction)一书的作者理查德-佛斯特(Richard Foster)曾被《福布斯》杂志称为“创新的男巫”(The Wizard of I.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin destructio(n-), from the verb destruere (see destroy)

entry.def: Destruction is the act of destroying something, or the state of being destroyed.

example.ex: ...an international agreement aimed at halting the destruction of the ozone layer.
example.tran: 一项旨在阻止臭氧层破坏的国际协议

means.word_mean: 1. termination by an act of destruction
2. an event (or the result of an event) that completely destroys something

sentences.sentence: "the so-called glorious experiment came to an inglorious end"

auth_sentence.content: The forces of destruction are winning, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: The forces of destruction are winning, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The forces of destruction are winning, he says.

auth_sentence.content: We will prevail over this destruction, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will prevail over this destruction, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will prevail over this destruction, he said.

auth_sentence.content: When the destruction came, it was strangely ordered.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the destruction came, it was strangely ordered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the destruction came, it was strangely ordered.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可破坏的, 易毁坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: destruct破坏+ible能……的→adj.可破坏的, 易毁坏的
destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释

de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋

instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段

struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑

super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去"等; 2. 表示"使……成为,加强"等

Sentence.sentence: Yes, there is a trickle（涓涓细流）of biofuel（生物燃料）available, and more may become available, but most biofuels cause economic waste and environmental destruction.

means.word_mean: 摧毁，破坏, 毁灭, 消灭

sentences.en: The enemy bombs caused widespread destruction.
sentences.cn: 敌人的炸弹造成大面积的破坏。

jushi.english: The enemy bombs caused widespread destruction.
jushi.chinese: 敌人的炸弹造成大面积的破坏。

jushi.english: The soldiers carried out the total destruction of the village.
jushi.chinese: 那些士兵彻底毁灭了这个村庄。
